body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install opencv@3.4.6+cuda ^hdf5+hl
```
### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux compute-101 3.10.0-957.12.2.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue May 14 21:24:32 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information

Cuda version is `cuda@10.1.243`

[spack-build-out.txt_opencv.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4017893/spack-build-out.txt_opencv.txt)
title: opencv@3.4.6 fails to build with error "dynlink_nvcuvid.h: No such file or directory'
